q0.question: Who steals all of the pills?
q0.recall: Trip steals all of the pills.
q0.vectordb: Trip steals all of the pills.

q1.question: What does Gretchen do after she discovers Trip is carrying drugs ?
q1.answer: ['stops the vehicle to kick Trip out']
q1.recall: Gretchen kicks Trip out of the vehicle.
q1.vectordb: It is not mentioned what Gretchen does after she discovers Trip is carrying drugs.
q1.hybrid: It is not mentioned what Gretchen does after she discovers Trip is carrying drugs.

q2.question: Whose car did they see leaving the diner?
q2.recall: The car they saw leaving the diner was their own.
q2.vectordb: The car that they saw leaving the diner was their own car.
q2.hybrid: The car that they saw leaving the diner was their own car.

q3.question: What does Gretchen discover ?
q3.vectordb: Gretchen discovers that the car that the group had seen leaving the diner was actually their own car, and each of the deaths at the hotel were reflected by their own deaths in the car. Gretchen and Jack discuss the fact that neither of them has any recollection of the accident. No mention is made of the incidents at the motel.

q4.question: What part of his body does Nelson fatally cut on a shard of glass?
q4.recall: Nelson fatally cuts his throat on a shard of glass.
q4.vectordb: Nelson fatally cuts his neck on a shard of glass.
q4.hybrid: Nelson fatally cuts his throat on a shard of glass.

q5.question: Where is Cookie killed?

q5.vectordb: Cookie is killed in the pit toilet.
q5.hybrid: Cookie is killed in the pit toilet.

q6.question: what did Cookie die from?
q6.vectordb: It is not mentioned in the extracted parts of the document how Cookie died.

q7.question: Who was the driver of the RV?
q7.recall: The driver of the RV was Henry.
q7.vectordb: The driver of the RV was Henry.
q7.hybrid: The driver of the RV was Henry.

q8.question: Why did Gretchen survive?
q8.recall: Gretchen survived because she was wearing her seat belt and remained in the car during the accident.
q8.vectordb: The reason Gretchen survived is because she was wearing her seat belt during the car accident. The other members of the group died due to various injuries sustained in the crash. Radford, who had been stalking Trip, witnessed the accident and attempted to assist. Gretchen and Jack discuss the accident in the final scene, but they have no recollection of it. No mention is made of the incidents at the motel.
q8.hybrid: Gretchen survived because she was wearing her seat belt and remained in the car during the accident.

q9.question: What do Gretchen and Jack have no recollection of?
q9.recall: Gretchen and Jack have no recollection of the accident.
q9.vectordb: Gretchen and Jack have no recollection of the accident.
q9.hybrid: Gretchen and Jack have no recollection of the accident.

q12.hybrid: The group notices an overturned car on the highway, which they dismiss as an abandoned accident.
